preferences.name: instanceNames
preferences.title: Instance Names
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of Zendesk instance names (e.g., 'My Company, Test Instance, Production')

preferences.name: subdomains
preferences.title: Subdomains
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of Zendesk subdomains (e.g., 'yourcompany, testcompany, prodcompany')

preferences.name: users
preferences.title: API Users
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of API users (e.g., 'api_user@yourcompany.com/token, test@testcompany.com/token')

preferences.name: apiKeys
preferences.title: API Keys
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of API keys corresponding to each instance

preferences.name: colors
preferences.title: Colors (Optional)
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of hex colors for each instance (e.g., '#007bff, #28a745, #dc3545')

preferences.name: productionFlags
preferences.title: Production Flags (Optional)
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of 'true' or 'false' values indicating if each instance is production
